data.text: Ku sûngsuokngei Israelngei chu sanminringin om rese ngei ti hih ku nuom tak le Pathien kôma ki ngên ngâi tak ani.
Pathien tieng ningsietakin an om ti ki riet, aniatachu an inpêkna hah rietna diktaka inngam nimak.
Pathien'n mi dik a minchang lam hah riet theiloiin anni an lampui an jûi ngita, Pathien'n dik a min changna balam nuoia han inpêklût nuom mak ngei.
Khrista chu Balam murdi mongna ania, a iem murdi chu Pathien kôm dik intuma an om theina rangin.
Moses han Balam jôm sika dik changna thurchi hi anghin a miziek, “Balam chongpêk a jômpu chu ring atih,” ti.
10:6-8: Bal 30:12-14 Taksônna sika dik changna thurchi rek chu, “Tumo invâna kal ranga?” (Mahan tumo chungtieng renga Khrista hong ruoi rang tina ani)
Tumo pilrîla juong se ranga? (thina renga tumo Khrista hong ruoi rang, tina ani) nin mulungrîlin ti no roi, a tia.
Hanchu imo a ti? “Pathien chong han, nu mûr le nu mulungrîla nang anâi ani,” ma taksônna chong hah kin misîr ani.
Na mûrin Jisua hah Pumapa ani tiin nu phuonga, thina renga Pathien'n a kaithoi ti nu mulungrîlin ni iemin chu sanminringin om ni tih.
Mulungrîla taksôn chu dik minchang an nia, mûra thop chu sanminringin an om sa ngâi.
10:11: Isa 28:16 Pathien lekhabu'n, “Tukhom ama iem murdi chu mâimôkinshakin om no ngei,” a ti ani.
Juda le Jentialngei hah ite lei teina dôn mak ngei, Pumapa inkhat hah anrênga Pumapa ania, Ama ralam ngei kai chu sat a vur ok ngâi.
10:13: Joel 2:32 Pathien lekhabu'n, “Tukhom Pumapa riming ralam ngei murdi chu sanminringin om an tih,” ati anghan.
Nikhomsenla, an iem loi hah i angin mo an ralam thei ranga? An rietloi hah i angin mo an iem thei ranga? Thurchi misîrpu omloiin kho angin mo an riet thei ranga?
10:15: Isa 52:7 Itîr niloiin kho angin mo thurchi an misîr ranga? Pathien lekhabu'n Thurchi Sa hong mintungpu ngei chu en ahoi bâk na! ati anghan.
10:16: Isa 53:1 Hannisenla, Thurchi Sa hah anrêngin chu pom let mak ngeia, Isaiah reng khomin, “Pumapa kin chongril tumo a iem?” a ti ani.
Ma anghan, taksônna hah chong riet sikin ahong oma, chong rietna hah Khrista thurchi misîrna sikin ahong om ngâi.
Hanchu, thurchi an riet loi tatak mini? an riet ngêt Pathien lekhabu'n,
Hanchu, Israelngeiin an riet loi mini? amotontaka Moses rengin
Isaiah'n hâi uolin,
Hannirese, Israelngei chungroia chu, “Hedonloi ngei le inhel mingei modôm rangin sûntuonin ka bân ka phar ngâi,” a ti.
